title: Frequently Asked Questions
description: Find answers to common questions about Flowtify AI

faqs.question: What is Flowtify?
faqs.answer: Flowtify is an AI-powered workflow automation platform that helps businesses streamline their processes, reduce manual tasks, and improve productivity through intelligent automation.

faqs.question: How does Flowtify work?
faqs.answer: Flowtify uses machine learning algorithms to analyze your workflow patterns, identify automation opportunities, and create intelligent workflows that adapt and improve over time.

faqs.question: What are the main benefits?
faqs.answer: Key benefits include 80% reduction in manual tasks, improved accuracy, faster processing times, cost savings, and the ability to focus on strategic work instead of repetitive tasks.

faqs.question: What are the pricing plans?
faqs.answer: We offer flexible pricing starting at $29/month for small teams, $99/month for growing businesses, and custom enterprise plans. All plans include core features and support.

faqs.question: Do you offer a free trial?
faqs.answer: Yes! We offer a 14-day free trial with full access to all features. No credit card required to start your trial.

faqs.question: Can I cancel anytime?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. You can cancel your subscription at any time with no penalties or hidden fees.

faqs.question: What support do you offer?
faqs.answer: We provide 24/7 customer support via chat, email, and phone. Plus, comprehensive documentation, video tutorials, and dedicated onboarding for enterprise customers.

faqs.question: Is training included?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide comprehensive training for all users, including live webinars, on-demand courses, and personalized training sessions for enterprise customers.

faqs.question: How long does onboarding take?
faqs.answer: Most teams are up and running within 1-2 weeks. Our onboarding process includes setup assistance, workflow design consultation, and team training.

faqs.question: How secure is Flowtify?
faqs.answer: We use bank-level security with SOC 2 compliance, end-to-end encryption, and regular security audits. Your data is protected with enterprise-grade security measures.

faqs.question: What integrations do you support?
faqs.answer: We support 200+ integrations including popular tools like Slack, Notion, Salesforce, HubSpot, and many more. We also offer custom API integrations.

faqs.question: Can Flowtify scale with my business?
faqs.answer: Yes, Flowtify is designed to scale from small teams to enterprise organizations. Our platform handles millions of workflow executions daily.
